update.description:
~~I've started the tutorial, but it's still being improved, I'm adding images and explaining the detector in more detail.~~

This adds the last 3 checkpoints for task 3.

All information needed to review the PR should be on the tutorial:

#!/osrf/srcsim/wiki/finals_task3

~~This builds on top of pull request #54. If this looks unmanageable after that is merged, I can create more smaller PRs.~~

Here's a video completing all the checkpoints on task 3 in god mode:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gUsyCfwlNGw
update.title: Task 3: Integration

content.raw: This looks pretty good to me, with a few nitpicks in the Task3.cc code.
content.html: This looks pretty good to me, with a few nitpicks in the Task3.cc code.

content.raw: This particular check seems redundant; if either of these things is true, we'll have bailed out earlier, I think.
content.html: This particular check seems redundant; if either of these things is true, we'll have bailed out earlier, I think.

content.raw: Nitpick, but we should probably put brackets around the code in this if() statement.
content.html: Nitpick, but we should probably put brackets around the code in this if() statement.
